headline: Is Brandon Maxwell’s Partnership a Test of Williams-Sonoma’s (WSM) Brand Evolution Strategy?
summary: Earlier this month, Pottery Barn, a Williams-Sonoma, Inc. brand, announced an exclusive home furnishings collaboration with renowned fashion designer Brandon Maxwell, featuring bold colors, refined textiles, and signature motifs for bedding, decor, and more. The collaboration blends Maxwell's celebrated aesthetic with Pottery Barn's portfolio, aiming to offer customers a designer-inspired layered look, and arrives as Maxwell celebrates his brand's 10th anniversary. We'll explore how this...
